What do you consider youself?
My friends would call me: (choose one)

answers.text: The person who makes the perfect pastry, the gooiest cookies and the softest bread.
The person who boasts the best roast, has mastered the spiciest Indian and who isn't afraid of fancy knife skills.
I'm both - my friends are lucky to know me.
I'm neither - I have a stack of take-out menus.
